description: fol. 1b-72b. 206 x 147; 155 x 68 mm. 25 lin. 18th cen. Murādī, Silk al-durar, IV, 183sq.: Muṣṭafá ibn ḥusayn , d. 4 Ramaḍān 1123/1711; Brockelmann, GAL,: Muṣṭafá ibn Muḥammad , d. 1126/1714. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 453 (4-2); S II, 472. Incip.: ... بسم الله ... اما بعد فىقول ... محمد ... انه سأل من شىخه ووالده ... ان ىکتب له ما کان منه
author: Laṭīfī, Muṣṭafá.
creator: Laṭīfī, Muṣṭafá.
subject: Travel—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
